purpose: The code appears to collect system information including MAC addresses, hostname, and user info, then sends this data to external domains via HTTP requests.
flows: MAC addresses -> base64 encoding -> HTTP request
anomalies: Use of hardcoded suspicious domain names
analysis: This code collects sensitive system information such as MAC addresses, hostname, and user details. It then sends this data to known malicious domains (oast-cn.byted-dast.com, oast-row.byted-dast.com, oast.fun) using HTTP GET requests with disabled SSL certificate validation. This behavior strongly indicates malicious intent for data exfiltration.
conclusion: Malicious code designed for data exfiltration to third-party servers.
